title: Salesforce Agentforce for Marketing Launches With Autonomous Campaign Management
summary: Salesforce releases Agentforce for Marketing, a suite of AI agents that can autonomously plan, build, and optimize multi-channel marketing campaigns using Data Cloud's unified customer profiles.

title: Data Cloud's New Marketing Connectors Unify 150+ Advertising and Commerce Sources
summary: Salesforce expands Data Cloud with 150+ pre-built connectors for ad platforms, ecommerce systems, and analytics tools, giving marketers a unified data foundation without complex integration projects.

title: Einstein AI Gets Multimodal: Salesforce Marketing Cloud Now Generates Images and Copy Together
summary: Salesforce upgrades Einstein with multimodal generation capabilities, letting Marketing Cloud users create coordinated visual and text assets from a single prompt while enforcing brand guidelines.

title: Salesforce Marketing Cloud Personalization Engine Delivers 40% Revenue Lift for Retailers
summary: Retailers using Salesforce Marketing Cloud's AI-driven personalization report an average 40% increase in digital revenue, with real-time product recommendations and individualized journey paths cited as key drivers.

title: Agentforce Meets Commerce: Salesforce Introduces AI Shopping Assistants for B2C Brands
summary: Salesforce extends Agentforce into commerce with AI shopping assistants that guide consumers through product discovery, answering questions and making personalized recommendations on brand websites.

title: Salesforce Data Cloud Achieves Zero-Copy Integration With Major Cloud Data Warehouses
summary: Salesforce announces zero-copy partnerships with Snowflake, Databricks, and Google BigQuery, allowing marketers to activate warehouse data within Marketing Cloud without duplication or ETL overhead.

title: Marketing Cloud Account Engagement Adds AI-Powered Multi-Touch Attribution
summary: Salesforce adds AI-driven multi-touch attribution to Marketing Cloud Account Engagement (formerly Pardot), giving B2B marketers clearer visibility into which touchpoints drive pipeline and revenue.

title: Salesforce and Google Cloud Partner on Privacy-Safe Audience Activation
summary: Salesforce and Google Cloud announce a joint clean room solution enabling advertisers to match first-party CRM data with Google's ad inventory while maintaining user privacy through differential privacy techniques.
